articles.title: Series defeat to AFG makes us alert for Asia Cup, World Cup: Mehidy Hasan | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Bangladesh were humbled in the second ODI by 142 runs as Afghanistan sealed the series 2-0 with a game to play
articles.content:
Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran added 256 runs for the opening wicket © AFP
Bangladesh all-rounder Mehidy Hasan said on Saturday that 331 was a bit too much for them to chase against Afghanist… [+2298 chars]
